default.title_faceA: Press the card to answer the questions
default.endtitle_A: We will see if [partenaireName] knows you well!

question_3.question: How long could you be without mobile phone when you are with your loved one?

question_4.question: Do you think one can be reborn?

question_5.question: Are you a very curious person?

question_6.question: Did you have times in life when you thought you'd never find a partner?

question_7.question: Did you ever think about cheating on your partner?
question_7.d: What is the definition of cheating?

question_8.question: How long took it until you fell in love with your partner?

question_9.question: Can you imagine being together with your partner for the rest of your lives?
